column1: #Coronavirus: As far as the Federal Council is concerned, the highest priority is to protect the public. For that reason it is banning large-scale events involving more than 1000 people with immediate effect. @BAG_OFSP_UFSP #COVID19
Swiss Federal Heath Minister Alain Berset announces in live press conference that Switzerland forbids any event, private or public, involving more than 1000 people. #GIMSSWISS #COVID19 #gims2020
